meanings.definition: A type of arachnid with a small body and long legs.
meanings.sent1: The harvestmen crawled slowly across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a harvestmen in the garden today.
meanings.sent3: Why did the harvestmen invite all the spiders to the party? Because they wanted to have a leggy celebration!
meanings.sent4: The harvestmen moved gracefully, like a ballerina on eight slender legs.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the harvestmen's delicate movements.

meanings.definition: A person who gathers crops or other natural products.
meanings.sent1: The harvestmen worked hard in the fields to collect the ripe fruits.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather was a skilled harvestmen, always knowing the best time to gather the crops.
meanings.sent3: The harvestmen at the market had a big smile on his face as he displayed the fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent4: She was a true harvestmen, reaping the benefits of her labor in the bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The harvestmen's hands were rough from the work, but his heart was full of satisfaction.
